A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Doesn't fit in canon. Ackbar just dies an unceremonious death\, Leia somehow flies in space\, defying all previous canon which Disney disrespectfully destroyed. Should have used books as source material\, instead we get this overhyped dribble.. Sad to think this may be John Williams last film. I also agree with Hamill when it comes to the direction Luke has supposedly taken\, becoming one with the force. I don't think it was time and you risked losing the nostalgia factor\, which you did. Props on the space battle scene in the beginning\, phenomenal job with the sisters connection. I'm not a total snob! ;)
